dc:title: On Pilgrimage - December 1972
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: An open letter to Fr. Dan Berrigan. Expresses her love and gratitude for his and his brother's (Fr. Phil Berrigan) work for peace and their influence on the young. Speaks of abortion and birth control as genocide. Singles out sayings of Jesus on forgiveness and the continuous need to confess one's sins.
